title: kAriruL sherindu
sahitya:
kAriruL sherindu kAnakattiDai vazhi kANAdalaiginrEn kaik-koDuppAyE


anupallavi

  kUriya naghamuDaik-koDuvarik-kUTTangaL vIriDa alarinE mighu tuyaruzhandEn


caraNam    OlamiTTaDaindavarkk-udavi vAyenrAr OngoLi vaikaraiyil uvandenai shErppAi 
kAlamiTTu miruLil kalangiDap-pArppAyO kazhaliNai tanjamE gati tanil puNarppAi
